title: MediaCapture.InitializeAsync - throws unauthorized exception
body: It seems that there is a bug, which appeard after the last WP8.1 Update. MediaCapture.InitializeAsync keeps throwing UnathorizedException. I tested it on my previously (before the update) working example and MSDN sample.

comments.body: I have a 640 XL and the problem still persists.

This seems broken as of build 8.10.14157.200. I'm using that build on my daily Lumia 925 and it's definitly broken. On my Lumia 820 Developer device I'm running build 8.10.12397.895 and that seems to work normally.
